\\/D:\\/repos\\/stride-translations\\/pt: Windows 10 introduces the Universal Windows Platform (UWP), which provides a common app platform available on every device that runs Windows 10.
O Windows 10 apresenta a Plataforma Universal do Windows (UWP), que fornece uma plataforma de aplicativo comum disponível em cada dispositivo que executa o Windows 10.
Windows 10 introduces the Universal Windows Platform (UWP), which provides a common app platform available on every device that runs Windows 10.
For more information about UWP, see <g1>Intro to the Universal Windows Platform<\/g1> on the MSDN documentation.
Para obter mais informações sobre UWP, consulte <g1>Intro para a Plataforma Universal Windows<\/g1> na documentação MSDN.
For more information about UWP, see <g1>Intro to the Universal Windows Platform<\/g1> on the MSDN documentation.
